p: 2-phenyl-1-(pyridin-4-ylmethyl)cyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (33). The ethyl acetate organic phase was discarded and the combined organic phases obtained with the chloroform/isopropanol mixture were dried over anhydrous sodium sulphate, filtered and concentrated under reduced pressure to afford 110 mg of the desired compound as a brown solid (25% yield). 1H NMR (400 MHz, MeOD) δ 8.60 (d, J = 6.5 Hz, 2H), 7.84 (d, J = 6.4 Hz, 2H), 7.36 − 7.19 (m, 5H), 3.24 − 3.14 (m, 1H), 3.09 (dd, J = 9.2, 7.4 Hz, 1H), 2.75 (dd, J = 18.3, 10.7 Hz, 1H), 2.00 − 1.89 (m, 1H), 1.78 (dd, J = 7.3, 5.1 Hz, 1H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, MeOD) δ 177.0, 164.9, 141.9, 137.2, 130.2, 129.5, 128.5, 35.9, 32.9, 30.6, 19.2. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 16H 14O 2N [M-H] 252.10191 found 252.10334.
